NPP - Notice of Proposed Procurement 
======================================================

**Focus of the Proceeding:**
The Commission de la sûreté nucléaire (CSN) is seeking bidders to provide Professional Audit Support Services (PASS) under the Supply Arrangement, stream 2 - Internal Audit Quality Assessments. 

**Documents Available:** 
A Request for Proposal (RFP) document is available to qualified Supply Arrangement Holders who have been invited to bid on this requirement. The document includes detailed information about the requirements, procedures, and timelines associated with this procurement.

**Procurement Details:**
The procurement will be held using a Selective Tendering method. The following qualified bidders have been invited to submit a proposal:
•	A Hundred Answers Inc.
•	Aniko Consultants Inc., Samson & Associates CPA Consulting Inc., in Joint Venture
•	BDO Canada LLP
•	Deloitte LLP
•	Ernst & Young LLP
•	MNP LLP
•	Orbis Risk Consulting Inc. 
•	PricewaterhouseCoopers LLP
•	QMR Staffing Solutions Incorporated
•	Raymond Chabot Grant Thornton Consulting Inc.
•	Samson & Associates CPA/Consultation Inc.

Invitations will be extended to other interested Supply Arrangement Holders who wish to participate in this procurement. However, the Canada does reserve the right to extend the bid closing date accordingly.

**Award Criteria**
The contract will be awarded to the bidder that achieves the highest combined rating of technical merit and price based on the criteria outlined in the RFP document.

**Timing**
The tender closing date is 2024-04-29T14:00:00. The anticipated contract start date will be 1 to 2 months from the closing date. The contract duration is approximately 5 years.

**Solicitation Information**
For further information, a contract authority may be contacted by email.
